body_html: If parallelizing the training is difficult could we at least parallelize the computation of bottlenecks ? The should be no dependencies between the computation of two bottleneck, so their computation could scale to multiple GPU/CPU.
body_text: If parallelizing the training is difficult could we at least parallelize the computation of bottlenecks ? The should be no dependencies between the computation of two bottleneck, so their computation could scale to multiple GPU/CPU.
body: If parallelizing the training is difficult could we at least parallelize the computation of bottlenecks ? The should be no dependencies between the computation of two bottleneck, so their computation could scale to multiple GPU/CPU.
